title: Plot Compare GPR KRR
description: This lab will illustrate differences between a kernel ridge regression and a Gaussian process regression and how they are used to fit a dataset. We will also focus on tuning the kernel hyperparameters.

meta.title: Exploring Kernel Ridge Regression and Gaussian Process Regression
meta.description: Discover the differences between kernel ridge regression and Gaussian process regression in this comprehensive programming tutorial.
meta.keywords: machine learning, gaussian process regression, programming tutorial, scikit-learn, scikit-learn playground, data analysis, kernel ridge regression

meta.title: Изучение ядровой регрессии Ridge и гауссовской процессной регрессии
meta.description: Откройте различия между ядровой регрессией Ridge и гауссовской процессной регрессией в этом полноценном программировательском туториале.
